content:
Welcome to my PCT blog! I’ll be uploading posts here every week or so to give updates on my progress and share photos and anecdotes.
My first day on the PCT will be tomorrow, May 17th. I’m currently working on emptying out my apartment and getting everything in order.

title: Welcome
